summary: Improves The Bond of Matrimony ring you acquire from marriage in Skyrim to make it actually worth something, instead of junk in your hand.
descriptionHtml:
Improves The Bond of Matrimony ring you acquire from marriage in Skyrim to make it actually worth something. Mind you, that this item still isn\'t one that\'s supposed to be useful in battle since it\'s a marriage ring, not some ancient artifact you find in dungeons. So don\'t expect that it\'s be as strong as one.

Original stat was a 10% increase in Restoration magic. I added a few more enchantments just to make it slightly stronger, but not overpowered.
=========================================================================================================================================

[i][b]Being tied into the bond of matrimony, means that you are now dedicated to carry each other\'s burdens[/b][/i] -- Increase Carry weight by 15 points.

[i][b]Having a partner in life strengthens your will to live and survive[/b][/i] -- Increase Health regeneration by 10%.

[i][b]Lady Mara gives her blessing onto those who join in the bond of matrimony[/b][/i] -- Increase Restoration magic by 10%.

=========================================================================================================================================

[b]=== INSTALLATION ===[/b]
Use any mod manager like NMM or just manually drop them in Skyrim\'s Data folder. If you manual installed, don\'t forget to tick/activate the esp before starting the game.

[b]=== UNINSTALLATION ===[/b]
Remove or delete TrueBondOfMatrimony.esp

[b]=== LOAD ORDER ===[/b]
Anywhere will work

[b]=== COMPATIBILITY ===[/b]
Not compatible with anything that changes The Bond Of matrimony ring.

[b]=== CHANGELOG ===[/b]
v1.0 Initial release

v2.0 Fixed an issue where the Amulet of Mara has the same enchantment as the ring.
author: Nofumasa
